errors.long_msg:
unsupported language: intercal. supported languages are: apex, bash, c, c#, c++, cairo, clojure, cpp, csharp, dart, docker, dockerfile, elixir, ex, generic, go, golang, hack, hcl, html, java, javascript, js, json, jsonnet, julia, kotlin, kt, lisp, lua, none, ocaml, php, proto, proto3, protobuf, py, python, python2, python3, r, regex, ruby, rust, scala, scheme, sh, sol, solidity, swift, terraform, tf, ts, typescript, vue, xml, yaml

You may need to update your version of Semgrep, if you are on an old version that does not yet support this language.

paths._comment: <add --verbose for a list of skipped paths>
